name: Vaadin.GridFilterColumnElement

properties.name: header
properties.description: Text to display as the label of the column filter text-field.

properties.name: path
properties.description: JS Path of the property in the item used for filtering the data.

description:
`<vaadin-grid-filter-column>` is a helper element for the `<vaadin-grid>`
that provides default header template and functionality for filtering.

#### Example:
```html
<vaadin-grid items="[[items]]">
 <vaadin-grid-filter-column path="name.first"></vaadin-grid-filter-column>

 <vaadin-grid-column>
   ...
```
